description:
At last Haruki realives Kazuma`s true feelings, but while he`s confused at this sudden turn of events he can`t hide his joy that the girl he loved best likes him too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La neige fond, puis... tombe la neige (2)
Until the Snow Melts and Then Falls Again... (Part 2)
Yuki ga Toke, Soshite Yuki ga Furu made (Kouhen)
雪が解け, そして雪が降るまで (後編)
